decision_conditions: The development of any buildings hereby permitted shall not be commenced until works for the disposal of surface water have been provided on site in accordance with details to be submitted to, and approved in writing by, the local planning authority. The works shall thereafter be retained.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

<p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><font face="Arial, sans-serif">The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:</font></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><font face="Arial, sans-serif">-&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Existing Floor Plan/ Sections/ Elevations entitled Drawing: 7 ELM CLOSE_DEC 23_01</font></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><font face="Arial, sans-serif">-&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Proposed Floor Plan/ Sections/ Elevations entitled Drawing: 7 ELM CLOSE_DEC 23_02</font></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 36pt; text-indent: -18pt;"><font face="Arial, sans-serif">-&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;Site/Location Plan entitled Drawing: ST_23_17 Elm Close_001</font></p><div style="text-indent: -24px;"><br></div>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Single storey side to rear extension (demolition of detached garage)
